name: Carrots & Bunnies
description:
Press space to access your bunny! Press c to spawn carrots to feed the white bunny, if you spawn enough carrots, you may get another bunny! But, don't spawn too many carrots or you'll summon the void bunny D:

To feed to bunny, just drag the carrot towards the white bunny (the hit detection is a little off and broken, so you have to kinda dance around the bunny for it to work).

I really struggled w/ this prompt and I don't really like my game but that's ok :3
